Lash and Brow studio

New York / Philadelphia
[vc_empty_space height=”60px”]

LUCIA LASH/BROW

Eyelash & Eyebrow Care
Semi-Permanent Makeup
Wax

[vc_empty_space height=”100px”]PriceingBook NowNew Opening Stamford CTNew Opening Parkslope Brooklyn[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”50px”]

Dear : First time clients !!

[vc_column_text]

Thank you for visiting Lucia Lash and Brow! 

Lucia Lash and Brow’s main goal is to help clients achieve their desired eyebrow and eyelash designs, by using carefully selected products that will aid in maintaining the strength of  brow and lash hairs to keep them in the healthiest state possible . 

 
By conducting thorough consultations before every appointment, we make sure to get as much information as possible to make your lash and brow goals a reality! [/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”100px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”]Pricing[vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”]Appointment[vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

Detailed Consultations

We make sure to get as much information as possible and assist in helping you choose the best length, shape, or design that will give amazing results and exceed your expectations.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

Product

We use Keratin based products that will help to maintain strength and prevent damage, such as dryness and breakage, to lash and brow hairs.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

Time with customers

Lucia Lash/Brow is an appointment-based salon. This allows us to be client focused so that we can provide the best service and experience to each customer.

Location

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top”][vc_column][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”]Pricing[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”]Appointment[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”100px”][vc_column_text]

1.Commitment only to eyes and eyebrows

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

Wearing a mask is now required in most countries around the world and has now become part of the daily routine.

This year it’s all about the eyes, so the brow and lash trends are the new rave.

 

Instead of having to apply mascara or fill in brows every day, we will make sure that you wake up a #maskedbeauty every morning!

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”100px”][vc_column_text]

2.Commitment to detailed consultations

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

It is very important that we conduct thorough consultations before every appointment.

Not only do we what to know the look and style that you are going for, but we also want to know your everyday beauty routine so that we can help choose the best service possible.

It is also important that we educate all clients on the services that they will be receiving.

This ensures that you are knowledgeable about the service and how to apply the aftercare to your routines.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top” css=”.vc_custom_1615180626964{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

3.Commitment to Skills

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”35px”][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

At Lucia Lash/Brow we are always researching, updating our techniques, and making sure to stay up to date on all the latest trends.

 

Lucia Lash/Brow’s CEO  is also active as an instructor and has taught more than 700 students so far.

 

Pricing
Location

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

4.Commitment only to eyes and eyebrows

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

Wearing a mask is now required in most countries around the world. Because of this, a lot of women mainly focus on applying makeup to the eyes.

However, if you wear a mask the makeup around your eyes will easily bleed and come off quickly, resulting in you having to reapply more often during the day. For that reason, the beauty of the eyes is now attracting attention all over the world. To transform customers into more attractive women and make daily makeup easier

We have created a salon that specializes in eye design.
